modName: IMPERIAL SHIELD DESIGN - BLOOD NIGHT - ANCIENT ROMAN
summary: Shield Design for Skyrim Imperial Gards
descriptionHtml:
Design of this shield: 
The Luna symbol stands for paying attention - guardsman shall have this awareness and skill. Then you can see a horn of a narwal, also a very old symbol of the Roman Legion and stars symbolizing the gods light in \"olympos\".

You will receive the texture file.

It is pretty simple and baby kind easy to install this files but I\'ve made this note for you:

First make a copy of the original shields outside your Skyrim textures folder. 
Reason: The files with this package will overwrite the existing ones.

Then unzip the files youâ€™ve downloaded and drag and drop the texture files directly to 
the 

programs/skyrim/data/textures/armor/imperial 

folder.
author: Appius Lucretius
